    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030712</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Los cinco Reinos</string>
            <string language="en">The five kingdoms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die fünf Königreiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les cinq royaumes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os cinco reinos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I cinque regni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα πέντε βασίλεια</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se presenta un cuadro resumen con las características generales y una imagen como ejemplo de cada uno de los reinos.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic presenting a chart summarising the general characteristics and an image as an example of each of the five kingdoms.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Reinos</string>
            <string language="en">Kingdoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, das ein Diagramm zusammenfaßt die 
allgemeinen Eigenschaften und ein Bild als Beispiel von jedem der 
fünf Königreiche darstellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet présentant un diagramme récapitulant les 
caractéristiques générales et une image comme exemple de chacun des
cinq royaumes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que apresenta uma carta que sumaria as 
características gerais e uma imagem como um exemplo de cada um dos 
cinco reinos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che presenta una tabella che ricapitola 
le caratteristiche generali e un'immagine come esempio di ciascuno dei
cinque regni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που παρουσιάζει ένα διάγραμμα που συνοψίζει τα 
γενικά χαρακτηριστικά και μια εικόνα ως παράδειγμα κάθε ένα από
τα πέντε βασίλεια.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Königreiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Royaumes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
